Helping Military Youth Thrive

For over 20 years, we have been dedicated to empowering military youth with the tools to learn, grow, and succeed.

Learn More Subscribe to Events

Serving Iowa Guard Families

We rally around Guard kids and the adults who love them—before, during, and after the call comes.

Camps, kits, coaching, and everyday touchpoints are built with parent input so youth grow confidence, friendships, and steady routines no matter where duty takes your family.

Adventure Kits

Adventure Kits deliver seasonal STEM projects, health tips, and hands-on challenges Guard families open anytime with videos and supplies ready.

Sign Up

Summer Camp

Weeklong Summer Camp challenges Guard teens with team adventures, leadership labs, and mentor support that build lifelong friendships and confidence.

Get Updates

Military Family Events

Military Family Events gather Guard households for regional celebrations, workshops, and volunteer-led activities that strengthen community across Iowa all year.

View Events
Browse all programs

What Guides Our Work

Show up for Guard-connected kids and caregivers with year-round experiences, practical resources, and caring adults so home life stays steady through every drill, mobilization, and return.

Where We're Headed

Every Iowa Guard kid feels seen, supported, and ready for what's next — and leaders can point to stronger, steadier families because of it.

“The support these kids receive is incredible--it reminds them they're not alone. Military life is tough, and we're grateful for CYP helping our children feel seen and supported through it all.”

ARNG Parent

Partner With Us

From packing adventure kits to hosting family nights, community partners and volunteers help us keep Iowa Guard families encouraged and ready. Bring your time, skills, or resources and we’ll put them to good use.

Get Involved Watch Overview

Quick Access Resources

Need support fast? These partners offer tutoring help, counseling, deployment prep, and more. You can always explore the full directory for extra options.

Browse all resources

BGCA Mission Youth Outreach

Boys & Girls Clubs programming tailored to military-connected youth.

Child Care Aware (Army)

Child care fee assistance and respite programs for Army families.

Upwards Drill-Time Child Care

Pilot program providing no-cost childcare for military families during drill weekends and battle assemblies.

About Iowa CYP

Fostering community, resilience, and positive development among Iowa's military-connected children and families.
